ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t Struct Reference

(ClusterID = 0x0020) This request is generated from a Local Device to bind End Device with a Remote Device. The End Device Bind Request is typically generated by some user action like a button press. The destination addressing on this command shall be unicast, and the destination address shall be that of the ZigBee Coordinator. More...

Detailed Description

(ClusterID = 0x0020) This request is generated from a Local Device to bind End Device with a Remote Device. The End Device Bind Request is typically generated by some user action like a button press. The destination addressing on this command shall be unicast, and the destination address shall be that of the ZigBee Coordinator.

Definition at line 556 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

ShortAddr_t ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t::bindingTarget

The address of the target for binding. This is a short address of the local device.

Definition at line 560 of file zdo.h.

The IEEE address of the device generating the request.

Endpoint_t ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t::srcEndpoint

The endpoint on the device generating the request.

Definition at line 564 of file zdo.h.

ProfileId_t ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t::profileId

ProfileID wich is to be matched between two End_Device_Bind_Req received at the ZigBee Coordinator within the timeout value pre-configured in the ZigBee Coordinator.

Definition at line 568 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t::numInClusters

The Number of Input Clusters provided for end device binding within the inClusterList.

Definition at line 571 of file zdo.h.

ClusterId_t ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t::inClusterList[MAX_REQUESTED_CLUSTER_NUMBER]

List of Input ClusterIDs to be used for matching. The inClusterList is the desired list to be matched by the ZigBee Coordinator with the Remote Device's output clusters (the elements of the inClusterList are supported input clusters of the Local Device).

Definition at line 576 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t::numOutClusters

The number of Output Clusters provided for matching within outClusterList.

Definition at line 578 of file zdo.h.

ClusterId_t ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t::outClusterList[MAX_REQUESTED_CLUSTER_NUMBER]

List of Output ClusterIDs to be used for matching. The outClusterList is the desired list to be matched by the ZigBee Coordinator with the Remote Device's input clusters (the elements of the outClusterList are supported output clusters of the Local Device).

Definition at line 583 of file zdo.h.
